languages.text: Archeotech is often recovered in the frontier regions of the galaxy. While the Adeptus Mechanicus is particularly interested in the recovery of such ancient technology and considers all such devices sacred artefacts, some archeotech can also be considered forbidden and even heretical.
languages.original_text: Археотех часто обнаруживают на окраинах галактики. Хотя Адептус Механикус особо заинтересован в возвращении и обладании столь древними технологиями и считает все подобные устройства священными артефактами, некоторый археотех может расцениваться как запретный и даже еретический.

traits.locale_text: Archeotech is often recovered in frontier regions of the galaxy. While Adeptus Mechanicus is particularly interested in the recovery of such ancient technology and considers all such devices sacred artifacts, some archeotech can also be considered forbidden and even heretical.

Archeotech is often recovered in the frontier regions of the galaxy. While the Adeptus Mechanicus is particularly interested in the recovery of such ancient technology and considers all such devices sacred artefacts, some archeotech can also be considered forbidden and even heretical.

Archeotech is often recovered in the frontier regions of the galaxy. While the Adeptus Mechanicus is particularly interested in the recovery of such ancient technology and considers all such devices sacred artefacts, some archeotech can also be considered forbidden and even heretical.

Archeotech is often recovered in the frontier regions of the galaxy. While the Adeptus Mechanicus is particularly interested in the recovery of such ancient technology and considers all such devices sacred artefacts, some archeotech can also be considered forbidden and even heretical.

languages.text: Археотех часто обнаруживают на окраинах галактики. Хотя Адептус Механикус особо заинтересован в возвращении и обладании столь древними технологиями и считает все подобные устройства священными артефактами, некоторый археотех может расцениваться как запретный и даже еретический.

Archäotech wird häufig in den Grenzregionen der Galaxie gefunden. Während der Adeptus Mechanicus sehr an der Bergung derart alter Technologie interessiert ist und alle entsprechenden Geräte zu heiligen Artefakten erklärt, gilt manche Archäotech auch als verboten und sogar ketzerisch.
languages.original_text: Archeotech is often recovered in the frontier regions of the galaxy. While the Adeptus Mechanicus is particularly interested in the recovery of such ancient technology and considers all such devices sacred artefacts, some archeotech can also be considered forbidden and even heretical.

traits.locale_text: Archäotech wird häufig in den Grenzregionen der Galaxie gefunden. Während der Adeptus Mechanicus sehr an der Bergung derart alter Technologie interessiert ist und alle entsprechenden Geräte zu heiligen Artefakten erklärt, gilt manche Archäotech auch als verboten und sogar ketzerisch.

languages.text: C'est dans les confins de la galaxie qu'on découvre le plus souvent des reliques relevant de l'archéotechnologie. Bien que l'Adeptus Mechanicus s'intéresse tout particulièrement à la récupération de ces technologies antiques et considère de tels appareils comme des reliques sacrées, certains de ces dispositifs peuvent se voir interdits, voire frappés d'hérésie.
languages.original_text: Archeotech is often recovered in the frontier regions of the galaxy. While the Adeptus Mechanicus is particularly interested in the recovery of such ancient technology and considers all such devices sacred artefacts, some archeotech can also be considered forbidden and even heretical.

traits.locale_text: C'est dans les confins de la galaxie qu'on découvre le plus souvent des reliques relevant de l'archéotechnologie. Bien que l'Adeptus Mechanicus s'intéresse tout particulièrement à la récupération de ces technologies antiques et considère de tels appareils comme des reliques sacrées, certains de ces dispositifs peuvent se voir interdits, voire frappés d'hérésie.

languages.text: 远古科技经常会在银河系边缘地区发现。尽管机械修会特别热衷于复原这种古老的技术，认为所有的远古科技设备都是神圣的文物，但也有部分远古科技被认为是禁忌造物，甚至被视为异端知识。
languages.original_text: Archeotech is often recovered in the frontier regions of the galaxy. While the Adeptus Mechanicus is particularly interested in the recovery of such ancient technology and considers all such devices sacred artefacts, some archeotech can also be considered forbidden and even heretical.

traits.locale_text: 远古科技经常会在银河系边缘地区发现。尽管机械修会特别热衷于复原这种古老的技术，认为所有的远古科技设备都是神圣的文物，但也有部分远古科技被认为是禁忌造物，甚至被视为异端知识。

languages.text: 技術遺産は銀河系の辺境地域で回収されることが多い。帝国技術局はこのような古代技術の回収に特に関心があり、そのような装置はすべて神聖なアーティファクトとみなしているが、一部の技術遺産は禁忌とされ、異端視されることさえある。
languages.original_text: Archeotech is often recovered in the frontier regions of the galaxy. While the Adeptus Mechanicus is particularly interested in the recovery of such ancient technology and considers all such devices sacred artefacts, some archeotech can also be considered forbidden and even heretical.

traits.locale_text: 技術遺産は銀河系の辺境地域で回収されることが多い。帝国技術局はこのような古代技術の回収に特に関心があり、そのような装置はすべて神聖なアーティファクトとみなしているが、一部の技術遺産は禁忌とされ、異端視されることさえある。

languages.text: La arqueotecnología se encuentra a menudo en las regiones fronterizas de la galaxia. Aunque el Adeptus Mechanicus muestra especial interés por recuperar esta antigua tecnología y considera que todos sus dispositivos son artefactos sagrados, hay arqueotecnología prohibida e incluso herética.
languages.original_text: Archeotech is often recovered in the frontier regions of the galaxy. While the Adeptus Mechanicus is particularly interested in the recovery of such ancient technology and considers all such devices sacred artefacts, some archeotech can also be considered forbidden and even heretical.

traits.locale_text: La arqueotecnología se encuentra a menudo en las regiones fronterizas de la galaxia. Aunque el Adeptus Mechanicus muestra especial interés por recuperar esta antigua tecnología y considera que todos sus dispositivos son artefactos sagrados, hay arqueotecnología prohibida e incluso herética.

languages.text: Arkeotekler, genellikle galaksinin sınır bölgelerinden bulunup çıkarılırlar. Adeptus Mechanicus bu tür kadim teknolojilerin toplanmasına özel ilgi gösterse ve böyle her türlü cihazı kutsal eserden saysa da kimi arkeotekler yasaklı, hatta kâfirce kabul edilir.
languages.original_text: Archeotech is often recovered in the frontier regions of the galaxy. While the Adeptus Mechanicus is particularly interested in the recovery of such ancient technology and considers all such devices sacred artefacts, some archeotech can also be considered forbidden and even heretical.
